description: The unique identifier of the station
name: stationId

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
**How We Handle the Information We Gather When You Visit Our Website**

The type of information that we receive from your visit to our websites
depends upon what you do when visiting our sites.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
It is the policy of the USGS that we will not obtain personal identifying
information about you when you visit our websites, unless you choose to
provide the information to us (for example, through a questionnaire in which
you willingly provide such information, or in which you are requesting a
publication or other information to be transmitted to you by the USGS).

collection.label: OMITTED
OMITTED
collection.sentence:
The information collected is part of a systems log file,
and is only used internally for site management purposes.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
This information is primarily collected to create summary statistics, which
are used for such purposes as assessing what information is of most and least
interest, determining technical design specifications, and identifying system
performance or problem areas.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
We use the information we collect to measure the
number of visitors to the different sections of our site, and to help us make
our site more useful to visitors.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
If you
choose to provide personal information, such as by sending an e-mail,
submitting a form, or filling out a questionnaire or guestbook, we will use
the information you provide to respond to you.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
Any information that we collect via a questionnaire or a guestbook may be
subject to disclosure, but will be handled in accordance with the requirements
of the Privacy Act and the Freedom of Information Act to ensure the greatest
protection of personal privacy.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
The Department of the Interior does not collect information for commercial
marketing purposes.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
**Email or Web Forms**  \- When you send us personal identifying information
by contacting us via e-mail (that is, in a message containing a question or
comment) or by filling out a form that e-mails us this information, we use it
to respond to your requests.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
Information collected via e-mail or Web form will be retained at our
discretion in a readable form for as long as necessary to complete our
response.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
**File Transfer Protocol (FTP)**  \- Many USGS sites using the file transfer
protocol may also store your e-mail address if your Web browser is configured
to provide it.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
**Online Surveys**  \- When you voluntarily provide us with personal
information as part of an online survey, we use it to perform various
quantitative and qualitative analyses to improve customer service and
satisfaction.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
Information collected
via online surveys may be retained at our discretion for an indefinite period
of time.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
**Ordering Products Online**  \- When you voluntarily provide us with personal
information such as name, shipping and billing address, and credit card number
when ordering products online, we use the information to fulfill your order.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
Personal
Identifiable Information (PII) as defined by the Office of Management and
Budget (OMB) may be minimally collected by USGS to accomplish a purpose
required by statute, regulation or executive order.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
In the event that USGS
collects PII from a third-party website or application, the USGS Privacy
Officer must approve the collection, and the public will be notified via a
Federal Register comment period which will contain the type of information
being collected, the intended purpose of the collection, the retention period,
as well as any other specifics.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
In these cases, the USGS personnel
responsible for running that USGS account(s) will request your mailing address
via e-mail for the sole purposes of mailing the prize(s) to you.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
Before doing so, we do capture the content of that comment for
records purposes, but we do not collect the name associated with that content.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
The USGS
is solely interested in our interaction with the general public and not
collecting personal identifiable information.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
In these cases, the USGS personnel
responsible for running that USGS account(s) will request your mailing address
via e-mail, for the sole purposes of mailing the prize(s) to you.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
Contest
winner(s) who provide their postal mailing address will do so voluntarily.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
**Google Analytics:**  "Like many services, Google Analytics uses …
[cookies](http://www.google.com/intl/en/privacy/faq.html#toc-terms-cookie) to
track visitor interactions.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
These cookies are used to store information, such
as what time the current visit occurred, whether the visitor has been to the
site before, and what site referred the visitor to the web page.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
The
U.S. Geological Survey does not collect personally identifiable information
from these third-party tools, nor provide them with additional PII.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
**Hotjar**  \- The USGS uses Hotjar to track interactions with the USGS.gov
flagship site to better understand areas of the site which are causing
problems for visitors when navigating, completing tasks, or in the general
ease of finding content quickly and easily.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
If a Pinterest user or member of the public interacts with USGS through its
official Pinterest account, posts comments on an image in a USGS Pinterest
collection, requests information or submits feedback through Pinterest, their
name, gender, profile photo, free-form biography, location/hometown, website
URL and email address, and other personal information provided by the user may
be used by USGS to communicate or provide the requested information.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
The USGS
does not collect or share PII through its use of Pinterest, except in unusual
circumstances where user interactions indicate evidence of criminal activity,
a threat to the government, a threat to the public, or an employee violation
of USGS policy.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
This information may include name, gender, profile photo,
free-form biography, location/hometown, website URL, email address, comments
and other personal information provided by the user, and may be used to notify
the appropriate agency officials or law enforcement organizations.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
In these cases, the USGS personnel responsible for running
that USGS account(s) will request your mailing address via e-mail for the sole
purposes of mailing the prize(s) to you.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
Contest winner(s) who provide their
postal mailing address will be done voluntarily.

so, we do capture the content of that comment for records purposes, but we do

collection.label: OMITTED

The USGS is solely

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
**SurveyMonkey**  \- The USGS uses SurveyMonkey to create online surveys while
also managing and analyzing data.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
USGS survey organizers will specify the level of
requested information when they create their surveys.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
In our use of the Twitter service, the USGS
does not archive any of your personally identifiable information other than
what any public person(s) may see within the content of a tweet (e.g., the
Twitter profile name if a USGS account replies to that person(s)).

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
In
these cases, the USGS personnel responsible for running that USGS account(s)
will request your mailing address via e-mail for the sole purposes of mailing
the prize(s) to you and will be completely voluntary.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
Visitors to YouTube
will typically have a persistent cookie sent from YouTube which may include
some personal information related to your Google account (if you have one).

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
Information pertaining to what YouTube stores and/or collects for their use
can be viewed at [the YouTube privacy
webpage](http://www.youtube.com/t/privacy_at_youtube).

collection.label: OMITTED

In
these cases, the USGS personnel responsible for running that USGS account(s)
